title: Cider no You ni Kotoba ga Wakiagaru (Words Bubble Up Like Soda Pop)
synopsis: The visual features the tagline, "I met you in my 17th summer..." The "boy-meets-girl" story depicts how words and music bridge the gap between Cherry, a boy who is terrible at communicating with other people, and Smile, a girl who hides behind a mask. They meet in a mundane suburban shopping mall in a provincial city.
related_anime: ['Cider no You ni Kotoba ga Wakiagaru']
